> I'm not planning any other dynamic library dependencies. What others are
you thinking of?

None, but that's an ambitious assumption that we will ever need another
dynamic library dependency.

> I would sooner implement the high level audio package directly on OpenSL
and remove it than add another library like it.

If you're OK to remove al/alc packages, fine. I can switch to an OpenSL
backend for Android for the higher level player.
